DOC.brief_summary: A medical device study to assess the clinical accuracy and equivalence to reference devices of the SVSS to satisfy the requirements of the recognised applicable international standards. The SVSS is designed to measure and display 5 vital signs: pulse rate, blood oxygen saturation (Sp02), blood pressure, body temperature and respiration rate. These results will be compared for accuracy with the results obtained using standard vital sign measurement equipment on the same subject.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Demonstrate the Clinical Accuracy of the Smartphone Vital Signs System (SVSS)
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers, male or female, 18 yrs or older, willing and able to participate and sign the informed consent form.
